needle: Figs are one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.
Prosciutto is one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.
Goat cheese is one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.

model_response.text: Working for yourself is the natural way to live.  In most people's minds, work and fun are opposites by definition, as opposed to work and rest.  The purpose of the old work culture was to prepare us for work, not make us fit it.  A typical high school in the 1960s taught us that work was not enjoyable, as most of them were raised in an environment where work and fun were opposite.
